# pageController(_:didTransitionTo:)

**Instance Method**

This message is sent when any page transition is completed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func pageController(_ pageController: NSPageController, didTransitionTo object: Any)
```

## Parameters

- **pageController**: The page controller.
- **object**: The object to display.

## Transition Notification

- **pageControllerWillStartLiveTransition(_:)**: This message is sent when the user begins a transition.
- **pageControllerDidEndLiveTransition(_:)**: This message is sent when a transition animation completes.
